channel.title: Points in shops change
channel.description: How do I change the amount of points you need to buy something in a shop? for example: a donator points shop. What file would that be in? Please help, I simply can't find it :\ I know it's kinda lame that I don't know...

item.title: Points in shops change
item.dc:creator: @sop-scape sop-scape
item.description:
@sop-scape wrote:

if its 317 pi use this
src/server/model/shops
find this ShopAssistant
You will see something likes this

case ##: return #;

= id number of item

#= amount of points

Read full topic
